price: Dijeron [los nobles]: "Retenlos a él y a su hermano, y envía reclutadores a las ciudades
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
